posts.author: BCShop.io
posts.text: We are happy to announce BCShopio  a platform for ecommerce of a new generation based on smartcontracts on the Ethereum blockchain Reliable decentralized with minimal fees ready to be used for payments for digital goods and services around the worldBCShopio is based on the most popular Ethereum online wallet and doesnt require any software installation or registration Anyone will be able to place a digital good or service offer in a couple clicks and share it with a short link Forget about the need to copy long unreadable addresses BCShopio makes crypto currency convenientLearn more about the platform in a visual presentation Prezentatsiyaenpdf Soon we will run a bonus program for everyone participants will be able to receive bonus tokens and change it later for ETHFollow the news in our telegram channel For now you have the opportunity to get familiar with BCShopio in the test network httpstestnetbcshopioIn order to start experiments at once we made a wallet topped with test ETH wallet address xbaBeAEFccbbdDEbdEfEafcDdprivate key ddfcdccfbfccbffdcbafcecdWe have a token presale running with a  bonus tokens to early participants Minimum contribution at this stage is  ETH For more information please visit BCShopioWe will be grateful for the feedback and look forward to your questions

posts.author: BCShop.io
posts.text: Token sale details httpsbcshopioStart Date th January   GMTEnd Date th Ferbrary   GMTSoft cap  ETHHard cap  ETHBonuses up to Short QA sectionQ Why so low capsA We are experienced and highly effective team focused on development We dont need more at this stage to deliver commercial productQ How many tokens will be distributed How many tokens were already distributedA Up to   tokens will be distributed at this stage   tokens were already distributed during presale and bounty campaignQ What happens with undistributed tokensA All undistributed tokens will be frozen until commercial release They will be moved to longterm development fund and will be unlocked for project development needs during next stages Each stage unlocks small amount and is publicly announced at least  days beforeQ Are you going to exchangesA Sure we are applying to all major exchanges We already implemented Bancor protocol which guarantees decentralized exchange with  fees

posts.author: BCShop.io
posts.text: Community Development Campaign AnnouncementTo promote the launch of the first featurefull blockchainbased ecommerce and epayments platform in accordance with art  of Appendix to General Terms  Conditions of BCS Tokens Sale with this letter BCShopio announces comprehensive community development campaign The campaign will consist of several different activities and reward poolsToken Holders PromotionThis promotion is dedicated to our early token holders who obtained BCS tokens before actual mainnet release thus helping to make BCShopio platform into reality We will make ALL token holders snapshot at th of May  and k tokens will be reserved for distribution between those token holders in the snapshot Tokens will be rewarded proportionally to token holdings so k tokens will lead to  reward given the current circulating supply of k tokensNote It is obligatory for you to qualify for the reward We ask you to write your feedback about BCShopio platform after mainnet release in a free form at telegraph and send it to bountybcshopio dont forget to specify your wallet address with BCS tokens The qualification process is conditioned by regulators recommendations and teams adherence to Customer Development approach Your valuable feedback will be used to improve the platform and deliver better experience to all its usersWe will start sending rewards weekly after mainnet release and there will be no set deadline so feel free to qualify at your convenience Sharing your personal experience in social media networks is very much appreciatedBe sure that you hold tokens on personal wallets exchange wallets are not supportedAirdrop Campaignk tokens will be distributed for  members randomly chosen from those who qualified To qualify follow bots instructions in bounty campaign channel httpstmebcshopbountyWe will determine  people to receive  BCS tokens each with the help of randomorg website For the process to be transparent fair and verifiable we will use the hash code of the first Ethereum block mined after  AM UTC st of June  as a persistent random seed Thus every participant of the airdrop will be able to verify winners sequence itselfWe will start sending BCS tokens to its new lucky holders right after winning sequence is generated June st Bounty CampaignBounty campaign fund of  ETH will be distributed between social media influencers The following content will be acceptedVideo review of the BCShopio platformVideo or text with screenshots introduction of BCShopio platformOther content featuring BCShopio comparing it to other blockchain based competitors etcNonspeculative content is expected with actual observations of the platforms functions and token usageafter mainnet releaseTo apply for the bounty campaign send us your introduction to bountybcshopio We will carefully consider all applications and choose several candidates to cooperate with About BCShopioBCShopio project aims to reinvent the way digital commerce and payments work today Focusing on digital goods and services area projects goal is to enhance it with fastgrowing opportunities blockchain technologies and cryptocurrencies have to offer In January  BCShopio hit hard cap of  ETH at its token sale

posts.text: ANN Topic httpsbitcointalkorgindexphptopicnewnewThis ICO still has to start and hasnt even gone into PreICO phase yet but if the stuff they are showing already are true it has potential They want to create a platform for VR Games where people can use their cyrptocurrency to wager bets on outcomes of certain games They will launch their games on the Steam platform and this is a suprlus in my eyes cuz Ive seen other coins launch games but use their own launcher or website in stead of using Steam to distribute their games They even have a guy named Wes Chamberlain on board for their first VR Baseball game Im European so dont know much about Baseball but the name did ring a bell with me

relying on a central serverIt uses open protocol to facilitate secure payment transactionsThe storage server is decentralized and distributeddivided into various servers run by each user connected to the networkTransfer Fee is Very Small to ZeroTransfer fee can be removed until free but to speed up transactions you can set the cost in Steneum wallet as needed no matter how much coin is sentTransactions are Very EasyYou can transfer Steneum to the entire world as long as it is connected to the internet and it will be deposited into Steneum Wallet Heres the stepsRegister via Web wallet or Download Wallet appEnter Steneum Address from the transaction opponent and the amount of Steneum you want to transferKlik send buttonThe Number of Steneum is LimitedSteneum supply is only  million coins worldwide When the demand is increasing while the supply is unchanged the value of Steneum will raiseThe Differences Between Bitcoin and SteneumThough Steneum is nearly identical to Exchangers STN with the opening price of USD  and increasing volume Use your earliest opportunity to have a coin at the lowest price from usLENDING PROGRAMIts a very interesting concept for passive investors and perfect for those who do not want to get headache about investment returnsWe can not promise how much profit we can give each month but were opening up this opportunity to our passive investors to get a similar opportunity when they do not have time to be activeSteneum is created to support bitstencom exchange projectIt is used to pay trading fee or enlist new coin and be as a profit from trading fee on market bitsten Lending Program is Fluctuative depends on to total coin lending and market bitsten volumeReal Profit Lending Calculation FormulaDaily profit each  STN   MV  FEE    Total STN on lendingExampleMV  market bitstencom volume   BTCFEE market bitstencom  Total STN on lending            BTC each STN per DayWith this estimation if STN price is  the daily lending profit is The daily lending profit amount is able to change depends on the number of lending and volume marketThe more bitstencom market volume the more profit generatedUNIQUE LENDING SYSTEMUnlike other coins the steneum is unique Steneum is a real project for real benefits for the team and for investorsSteneum does not use fiat like  USD on lending program if you lending with  STN Then We will return  STN at the time the contract is finishedprofit that will be distributed every day is the result of real income from bitsten dot com exchangerIf when you start lending  STN by buying   per STN or you invest  by the time the contract expires we will refund  STN instead of  When the contract expires you can withdraw or renew your contract of your choiceIf at the time the contract ends the price stn in the market has risen to   per STN then you will get a STN worth    similarly if the STN price goes down you will still get a refund within the STN not in dollarsYou can lending all the coins in your wallet all the coins in the lending will be stored in bitsten and will not be sold in the marketThe purpose of the lending system is to minimize the coin circulating in the market so the coin increasingly rare and can boost the price of STNIf for example from M STN suply has M public STN mining  bounty  ICOand coin are on lending a number of M then the coin circulating in the exchanger is only MWe are confident that with the fewer coins in circulation the coin price will increaseWith a system like this there is no MONEY GAME in the lending steneum systemThe amount of coin lending will not exceed the amount of coin that publickAll coin on lending will earn commissions from a clear sourceRULE LENDING Total lending is no minimum or maximum terms all coins in your wallet can be lending The contract time  days depending on the amount Commission is given every day according to the formula Lending  The Commission is given in BTC Daily commissions can be withdrawed daily After the contract expires STN will be returned a number of STN you are lendingUse of STN on Bitsten exchangeSteneum will be used in bitsten market as currency or tool to pay transaction feeIf the theme: [ANN] [WELL] - THE DECENTRALIZED GLOBAL MARKETPLACE FOR HEALTHCARE

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: WELL is building the global decentralized blockchainbased marketplace for healthcare WEBSITE  WHITEPAPER  MEDIUM  STEEMIT  TWITTER   TELEGRAM  FACEBOOK INSTAGRAM  YOUTUBE  REDDIT

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: No doubt that the cost of healthcare continues to be a hotly debated topic Some say that such high pricetags can be associated with system inefficiencies such as access and transfer of medical records Patient records are stored separately at different doctors and are often not up to date This creates quite a messy system where records cannot be fully authenticated or found And this is where blockchain steps in and fixes this problemHow Read our article and find it out

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: Blockchain is a real stateofart technology indeed Developing WEll we are utilizing many benefits of blockchain If you want to know what its features WELL uses and what do they bring to WELL  find it out here

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: Blockchain technology is perfect for applying it in healthcare And WELL is going to do it We gave thoughtful arguments for thatusing blockchain technology would result in accessible and affordable healthcare for anyone with access to the Internet Here are our view on how this innovative technology changes the healthcare industry Read our latest article

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: Blockchain technology is perfect for applying it in healthcare And WELL is going to do it We gave thoughtful arguments for thatusing blockchain technology would result in accessible and affordable healthcare for anyone with access to the Internet Here are our view on how this innovative technology changes the healthcare industry Read our latest article

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: How telemedicine can help diabetic patients huh They say diabetes management via the use of telemedicine has proved to be very successful Patients can take advantage of all is benefits such as convenience lower charges and access to a top doctor or specialist every day of the year WELL develops its network to make healthcare borderless and connect patients and doctors via decentralized marketplace enabled by blockchain Read our view on how telemedicine is empowering diabetic patients here on our blogToday WELL a healthcare blockchain platform is glad to officially announce  the launch of our  highlyanticipated token sale and WhitelistWELL founder Ildar Fazulyanov says WELL is a HIPAA compliant virtual care platform encompassing telemedicine biometric devices and telemonitoring to engage and manage patients and atrisk populations WELL has builtin secure messaging and their own private clinical network composed of over  providers covering  states in the US and some of the world Were planning to spend funds raised during the crowdsale for the development of our own blockchain and distribution of WELL platform all over the world You are welcome to check the details of the token sale on our Medium blog

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: Wall Street Journal states Driven by faster internet connections ubiquitous smartphones and changing insurance standards more health providers are turning to electronic communications to do their jobsand its upending the delivery of healthcare  Thanks to high tech a workable effective global solution in the form of telemedicine is now making huge waves and platforms such as WELL are successfully cornering todays international health care challengesWatch out our latest article and find out how we upending healthcare deliveryHey guys Weve got listed on Trackico  Just to remind you TrackICO is a listing that provides users reliable info about the best ICO projectsWELL got   a pretty good result right For the details and overview of WELL jump here

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: The WELL platform is of the people by the people and for the peopleWe want upgrade healthcare to completely another level and introduce Healthcare Without BordersNow all the WELL team members are working to do good by doing WELL Whats our social mission and what we would like to bring to healthcare Thats what our latest article is about

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: Blockchain technology is transforming the way business is done making it a whole lot smarter and much less expensive Moreover there is no longer any need for third parties and middle men Basically it supports cryptocurrencies and most importantly guarantees that all transactions are properly conducted and recorded These are just some of the reasons why the WELL platform chose it as its underlying structureHow Blockchain is Shaping the Future Read the new article to get our viewHey guys WELL launches BOUNTY CAMPAIGNIt will last till the end of the crowdsale until either the hard cap of M is reached or until May   WELLs exciting Bounty Program is a great chance for everyone to promote our project and get rewarded for doing it We reserve  of all raised ICO funds for our active supporters This amount depends on ICO resultsand the more successful the ICO is the more WELL tokens will be distributedOur bounty pool will be allocated among the following bounty sectionsSocial Media Bounty Signature campaign up to Blogging  Vlogging campaign up to Telegram campaign Creative Support  Translations up to Here is the bounty thread Take your chance to participateGOOD LUCK

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: WELL is a team of passionate and enthusiastic and highlyexperienced professionals in their field Thats who drives the project to success And now lets meet its members and learn who they are and what they are Who is Mr Ildar Fazulyanov Thats the Founder and CEO of WELL Inc A man with an exceptional educational background and noteworthy career Boasts an outstanding record of over  years of experience in healthcare fintech and venture capital at the highest levelsWe have a lot more to say about Ildar Invite you to read his bio and learn about his achievements on our latest MEDIUM article

posts.author: JoinWell.io
posts.text: Guys Reserve some time for tomorrowJanuary  WELL holds a WEBINAR featuring Ildar Fazulyanov WELLs founder  We will talk about new trends and advanced technologies in healthcare blockchain and telemedicine and of course what WELL brings to the industry Join the webinar and ask Ildar Fazulyanov direct questions on January   at  AM PST  GMTTo participate click hereThe  priority for WELL is to empower patients with firstclass care via our partnerships with highly qualified doctors and specialists In addition to this WELL operates in a precise structured way so that there is always transparency in what we do We use a decentralized system based on blockchain technology And thats WELL ADVANTAGE   Wanna read more Click to our MEDIUM to learn how we create a speedy seamless experience in healthcare

Marketing an accessible transparent and competitive marketplace that will open opportunities for thousands of influencers and brands all over the globe forming targeted audience exposure and engaging posts.text: BountyWebsiteWhitepaperBlogTwitterFacebookTelegramKoreanSpanishFilipinoIndonesianChineseWhitepaper TranslationsBoosteroid ICO has startedWe start the final stage of our ICO Cryptocurrency community expressed significant interest in our project and has already invested more than  million USD during previous ICO stagesRegister on ourwebsiteThe token sale will continue from January th till February th A total of  million BTR tokens is available for sale Investors can purchase tokens with ETH BTC LTC BCH as well as fiat money  BTR   Investors who purchase from  to   BTR will get additional  bonus tokens from   to   BTR from   to    BTR from    and more BTRIf you have any questions feel free to reach us  in our Telegram chatTechnical supporttelegramCheck our news and you will find a lot of interesting informationContact uswhitepaperwebsiteblogfacebooktwittertelegram

posts.author: Boosteroid
posts.text: HOW IS BOOSTEROID DIFFERENT FROM OTHER TOKEN SALESA new stage of Boosteroid crowdsale started on November th The project is collecting investments to create a cloud service platform and will use attracted funds to expand computing facilities and develop a cloud computer  Unlike many other startups we provide a clear variety of advantages for our investors and token holders  Idea  simple realistic and promising Cloud technologies are getting more and more popular not only among businesses but also among casual users PCs laptops and smartphones are rapidly becoming smaller and smaller however graphic cards and other components can not endlessly decrease in size So lack of processing power is an issue and our service will take it off the table Development plan  clear and achievable Our development plan and roadmap are public so everyone is able to check what tasks the team has at a particular stage We have a clear investment distribution model and a defined scaling plan We also know how much equipment we will be able to purchase considering particular ICO results Besides we have calculated the time when our tokens accepted as a payment for the service will expire You can find more information here The project is already being implemented We have already started an operation of a number of computational nodes in Kharkov Ukraine After the ICO we start building our computing facilities in free industrial zones of Georgia We also consider locating our facilities in Iceland UAE and the USA soonService test mode is launched  We have launched a test mode of our computing cloud to get feedback and fix all technical issuesThe number of BTR tokens is limited A total number of released tokens is  billion All unsold and undigested tokens as well as tokens accepted as a payment for Boosteroid services will expire after the ICOThe token corresponds to a real service We offer not just unclear promises but a real service to our investors  BTR   hour rent of Boosteroid computing power Computing power on the basis of eight NVIDIA GeForce GTX  Ti graphics cards two processors Intel Xeon E v RAM Gb SSD GbInvestors will be able to rent computing power with BTR tokens on more favorable terms BTR   Investors will have an opportunity to purchase promising tokens at the lowest price and then sell them at a higher priceCurrently the lowest  hour computing power rent provided by Amazon Web Services Microsoft Azure Google Cloud is from  to  Boosteroid offers the same service for only  BTR This means that token rate will increase by  times up to  after the ICOInvestors will get bonuses We decided to reward our backers for their trust The team has developed a special bonus system for those who support Boosteroid Investors who purchase from   to   BTR receive additional  bonus tokens Those who buy from   to    BTR get  and from    BTR and more  The token will be available on the exchange We have a preliminary agreement with Bittrex and YoBIT We also plan to reach other main digital currency exchanges and expect BTR rate to increase thanks to expansion of the demandThe demand for BTR will be maintained by applying token buyback on the exchange When Boosteroid is launched we will start our exchange service the service that accepts tokens USD and other cryptocurrency as a payment for the service  note It will automatically receive money paid by users who rent our computing power and use this money to purchase tokens on the exchangeTaking the above mentioned into consideration we can state that our team is among a few who are running a real economically feasible ICO

posts.author: Boosteroid
posts.text: A cloud computer will allow to process video create Dgraphics play games requiring high computer performance or carry out machine learning on any device even on the PC with the lowest performance The only necessary thing is a stable highspeed internet connectionBoosteroid will also solve the problem of high rent by reducing cloud computing costs Thank to the lowest rent the service will become affordable to every World Wide Web user

posts.author: Boosteroid
posts.text: Dear friends today we start the final stage of our ICO Cryptocurrency community expressed significant interest in our project and has already invested more than  million USD during previous ICO stagesThe token sale will continue from January th till February th A total of  million BTR tokens is available for sale Investors can purchase tokens with ETH BTC LTC BCH as well as fiat money  BTR   Investors who purchase from  to   BTR will get additional  bonus tokens from   to   BTR from   to    BTR from    and more BTRThe idea of Boosteroid is a revolution in cloud computing services We are developing easytouse and userfriendly interface so that even a child will be able to deal with itCurrently it is rather difficult to rent computing power provided by market leaders It is necessary to learn many instructions and watch a number of video guides Besides these services are as easytouse as for example MSDOS We decided to reach the iPadlevel and make it clear even for a childsays Ivan Shvaichenko Boosteroid CEOMoreover unlike other services Boosteoid is multifunctional Users will not only have an opportunity to work with big data files render video but also play games using any device even a PC with the lowest performanceThe only required thing is the highspeed Internet It does not matter where a user is located and how much processing power their devices haveIt will be possible to access computing power both via browser and a desktop app that will have a single account on mobile devices and PCsThe application will include various text and graphic editors cloud storages social networks and Boostore where a user can buy programs for charge or free of charge Users will be able to choose programs they need and launch them immediately the system will choose necessary computing power Advanced users will be able to change the settings of their cloud computer themselvesIt will be possible to enjoy the application already in spring Join our ICO Lets create a personal cloud computer available for everyone together

posts.author: Boosteroid
posts.text: Dear friends we are glad to share that tomorrow we start building new Boosteroid data center of  thousand m in Georgia free industrial zonethe city of KutaisiThe agreement with the government to locate computing facilities and connect them to local power grid was reached yet in October and November  And now we are implementing our plansWe do have to build data centers close to our clients if we want our service to operate worldwide Georgia is a great place to cover the part of Eastern Europe and Turkey Iceland will provide our services for Western Europe Ukraine for Eastern Europe Arab Emirates for Middle East and so on We are looking much further and Georgian data center is only a beginningproject CEO Ivan ShvaichenkoStay tuned we have a lot of interesting news cominglink to view photos httpsmediumcomBoosteroidboosteroidaea

posts.text: Only two weeks left until the end of the Boosteroid ICO We are grateful to you for staying with us and supporting our project personal cloud computer available for everyoneIn this regard we are often asked what will happen to the tokens after the ICO completed As we said earlier all undigested and undistributed tokens will be destroyedWhat are the steps for investing in BTR TokenIt is very easy to buy BTR tokens Everybody can do that till February th  You have to sign up in your personal account on our website choose the needed number of tokens and make a payment  BTR costs It is possible to buy tokens with ETH BTC LTC BCH as well as fiat moneyJoin Boosteroid ICO and become a part of the great project

posts.text: People often ask us how Boosteroid differs from other projectsThe major advantage of Boosteroid is that unlike many other services the platform is already being developed Weve already launched computing facilities with the peak power of petaflops and we will expand them regardless of the ICO resultsMoreover our token corresponds to a real service   BTR   hour rent of computing power BTR  the cost of one hour computing power rent on the basis of eight NVIDIA GeForce GTX  Ti graphic cards two Intel Xeon E v processors RAM Gb SSD GbAll undigested and undistributed tokens will be destroyedFollow us  Read more WebsiteWhitepaperFacebookTwitterBlogTelegram chat

posts.author: Boosteroid
posts.text: What is Big Data and Why does it need computing facilitiesFirst we need to know what data is Data is information Units of data collected organised and analysed help us to understand our worldBig data is the new science of understanding and predicting human behavior by studying large volumes of unstructured data Big data is also known as predictive analyticData is created every time an action is captured Before computers data was largely captured by the written word Now data is captured in a multiplicity of ways through smartphones and satellites cameras and cash registers sensors and social mediaAnalyzing Twitter posts Facebook feeds eBay searches GPS trackers and ATM machines are some big data examplesThe possibilities of big data are endless Perhaps doctors will one day predict heart attacks and strokes for individuals weeks before they happen Airplane and automobile crashes might be reduced by predictive analyses of their mechanical data and traffic and weather patternsOnline dating might be improved by having big data predictors of who are compatible personalities for you Musicians might get insight into what music composition is the most pleasing to the changing tastes of target audiences Nutritionists might be able to predict which combination of storebought foods will aggravate or help a persons medical conditionsThese tasks require large amount of computing powerFollow us  Read moreWebsiteWhitepaperFacebookTwitterBlogTelegram chat
